table.name: vtiger_schedular
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_schedular` ( `schedularid` int(11) NOT NULL, `schedular_no` varchar(56) default NULL, `schedular_starttime` DATETIME NOT NULL, `schedular_endtime` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`schedularid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_schedularidcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_schedularcf` ( `schedularid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`schedularid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
